name: Knit Shooter
description:
🪡Game Introduction Knit Shooter is a Roguelite survival game, players control a small needle and thread, in a wave of monsters to survive. Players can constantly obtain new weapons to enhance their firepower and fight more dangerous enemies. 🧶Group Members:
  • Ruchuan Ji ( Game Mechanic /Level Designer )
  • Ruijie Chen (Game 2D Art & UI Designer)
  • Jingwei Wu (Game 3D Art  Designer )
  • Yanyun Feng (Programer)
  • Yuhui Zhou (Programmer)
  • Zhijian Weng (Programmer)
🧵Used Assets
  • https://3dtextures.me/2021/08/05/fabric-knitted-005/
  • https://www.texturecan.com/details/65/
  • www.freesound.org
